description:
The attorneys at Greer, Russell & Dent, PLLC, are proud to be part of an experienced team of litigators in Tupelo. We have spent the past 40 years representing the interests of Mississippi individuals and businesses in a wide range of civil litigation matters.

Our practice areas
People in Tupelo know our law firm primarily for its work in general and complex litigation. These are some additional types of cases we take on:

  • Product liability: If a particular product has caused harm or failed to live up to its claims, we help our clients hold the company accountable.
  • Wrongful death: When the actions of negligent parties cost someone his or her life, we represent their survivors in the fight for justice.
  • Trucking accidents: Our law firm represents injured victims in some of the most severe crashes in Mississippi.
  • Insurance disputes: When insurance companies refuse to provide the coverage our clients paid for, we fight hard to hold them accountable and reverse this decision.
  • Professional malpractice: Our law firm represents people in cases where the professionals failed to uphold their duties or caused harm to our clients.
  • Estate planning and wills: We are proud to help families in and around Tupelo protect their assets today and secure their legacies for tomorrow.

Our approach
At Greer, Russell & Dent, PLLC, we put our clients first in everything we do. After all, our clients' successes determine our own success. Our attorneys also offer competitive rates to ensure our services are accessible to the people who need them.
